title: Quality evaluation of improved and traditionally dried Bombay duck (Harpodon nehereus) through biochemical, microbiological, and organoleptic analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Nafisa Nawar Tamzi, Farjana Ferdous Rozee, Tahsin Sultana, Md Faisal, Mohammed Nurul Absar Khan, Subrata Kumar Ghosh
